title: My game crashes
body:
My problem is when I'm "in game", the game gets stuck in the first 2 minutes of the game, and after him jam can not do anything, the only solution is to restart the PC.
How do I fix this?

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be running Windows 10 and have recently installed the Anniversary update, which enabled Game DVR in the Xbox app. I suggest [disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves this PC freeze.

Let me know if this helped.
